short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the word Former before each instance of President Trump.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accurately preface all online references to President Trump with the word "former". Update your world wide web experience and Make the Web Correct Again. Coded during the January 2021 (second) impeachment. Vote!
